description:
“drop in for a no drop run!”

not set route, no set pace, just a common place to meet up and find company for your monday miles! start the week off right and join us at 6:00pm every first, second, and third monday of the month at the trailhead store! 

what to expect:
- 6:00pm gather & mingle
- 6:05 icebreaker & introductions 
- 6:10pm depart for run
- 7:00pm return to Brooks

there will be a leader there to guide anyone interested in a 4-6 mile route, but you’re also welcome to buddy up and do your own thing! monday nights are for getting what you need :)

this event is open to women, trans, and non-binary people who are comfortable in a space that centers the experiences of women. our only rule is that nobody runs alone ❤️

*4th/5th monday will typically be field trip runs at outside locations announced on the cowgill strava page
title: womxn run the herd

description:
Join us for a Black Canyon Training Run with HOKA and Cowgill Trail Collective at Seven Hills Running Shop!

3.3 miles, 360ft https://www.strava.com/routes/3310125815591192578

6.5 miles, 678ft https://www.strava.com/routes/3310127501668613428
 

Event Timeline
6:00pm-6:30pm: Arrive early for HOKA demo shoes and find nearby parking
6:30pm-6:45pm: Go over announcements, take a group photo, and explain route/safety overview
6:45pm: Demo run starts
7:15pm: 5K Group returns to shop
7:45pm: 10K Group returns to shop
7:45pm-8:15pm: Hang out at the shop with food and refreshments, check out vendor booths
8:15pm: Raffle starts
8:30pm: Event finishes

Raffle includes one Black Canyon Ultras entry!
title: Black Canyon Training Run PNW
